title: Tales of Bristeria: The Reign of Witches
description: Tales of Bristeria The Reign Of Witches is a fantasy adventure about Annalise, a young girl who is running away from the darkness that is taking hold of her home. In the forest nearby she finds the most unique friendships and a doorway that leads to magical worlds filled with mystical creatures and mystical spells. Along the way, she discovers a powerful connection to magic, hidden strengths inside herself and begins to unlock the truth of it all. Along this journey, she starts to learn that not everything is always what it seems, not everyone can be trusted, and some paths lead to the darkest of magic, and possibly her destiny all along...
author: Brooke Smiley
